addons.description: Music plugin to access over 30000 international radio broadcasts from rad.io, radio.de, radio.fr, radio.pt and radio.es[CR]Currently features[CR]- English, german, french translated[CR]- Browse stations by location, genre, topic, country, city and language[CR]- Search for stations[CR]- 115 genres, 59 topics, 94 countrys, 1010 citys, 63 languages
addons.name: plugin.audio.radio_de
